NEW CHANGES: You can now disable usage of unsafe commands like `exec` & `eval` from configurations. Useful if you're hosting Bastion for someone else.
IMPROVEMENTS: Some under-the-hood changes & improvements, to make Bastion even better.
FIXES: Fixed an issue when Bastion displayed 'null' when you had no plain text response to trigger.
Some under-the-hood fixes, as usual, to improve Bastion.
